findings.title: Broad injunctive relief language
findings.rationale: Broad injunctive relief provisions can bypass standard dispute resolution safeguards.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...5. REMEDIES Breach of this Agreement may cause irreparable harm. The non-breaching party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief....
findings.context:
TERM
This Agreement shall remain in effect for four (4) years from the date of execution.

5. REMEDIES
Breach of this Agreement may cause irreparable harm. The non-breaching party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief.

Governing Law: Delaware

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
Implemented clause-level anchoring and false-positive suppression
